Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 72nd overall pick, by Baltimore in 2019...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2019, off Braulio Escandon (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/2019, off Tony Ramirez (HOU)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Washington on 7/29/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/2019, hitting .520 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Shortstop in 2019...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,907,143 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/2020, hitting .545 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Injured on 6/16/2020 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Minnesota on 9/15/2020...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Atlanta on 10/2/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/1/2021 to a 4-year deal worth $5,632,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
